content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Zero Trust Secure Access module for Windows version 2.25.1019 July 28, 2025—This update includes security enhancements, bug fixes, and feature releases as detailed in the following notes. Version 2.25.1019 New features Added connector IP information to Private Access connection details page. Enhancements Checks connectivity to the Trend Vision One Endpoint Security agent proxy when switching networks and falls back to direct connection if the proxy is unreachable. Resolved issues Fixed an issue where changes to the NTLM enable/disable setting in Trend Vision One does not immediately take effect in the ZTSA module. ZTSA failed to log in via NTLM when multiple users were logged into Windows. The user displayed in the ZTSA UI differed from the user shown on the Internet Access diagnostics page. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Zero Trust Secure Access module for Windows version 2.25.1019
